dataList.name: Former Heishou - Wu Adept
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: reset this unit's SP to -15 and gain 3 [LegStrengthHorse] and 1 [CrazyWei]
Take -50% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] (rounded down)

If this unit hits with a Cracked [SuperCoin], it does not activate the target's [Burst] effect (does not consume Count either)

Deal +50% damage against Staggered enemies

dataList.name: I will trample... and crush you to mulch
dataList.desc: If this unit has [LegStrengthHorse], inflict 1 [ConcussionWei] against the main target when this unit triggers [VibrationExplosion] against the main target

dataList.name: Soul Lost in Daylight (魂飛中天)
dataList.desc:
If this unit has [LegStrengthHorse], gain 1 [ReboundWei] when hitting with a Skill that triggers [VibrationExplosion] against targets without [Vibration] (does not gain any [ReboundWei] if its Stack is already maxed)

Turn End: if this unit's [ReboundWei] Stack is maxed, consume all of it; then, lose 1 [LegStrengthHorse] next turn

dataList.name: I'll scrape every filthy scale off your skin...
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: gain 1 [AttackUp] for every 2 Speed this unit has (max 2)
At 5+ Speed, gain 1 [SlashDamageUp] and 1 [HitDamageUp] as well

dataList.name: Intrepid trespasser...!
dataList.desc:
On Clash Lose: if the target's Coin was a Plus Coin, target heals 5 SP; if the target's Coin was a Minus Coin, target loses 5 SP (does not activate if the target's SP is at -40 or less). Then, give 2 E.G.O resources to the Affinity of the Skill the target used (3 times per turn)
- If the Skill's Affinity was Wrath or Gluttony, give 2 E.G.O resources of the least-owned Affinities as well

dataList.name: Damage Taken
dataList.desc:
When taking damage during the combat phase: +20% damage for the turn
During the combat phase: On Clash Lose, take +15% damage from the Skill

dataList.name: Plastered Training
dataList.desc: Deal +2% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 100%)

dataList.name: I've got nothing to fear with a bottle of wine by my side
dataList.desc: Turn Start: at max [SipOfAlcoholJin] Stack, consume 2 of its Stack and gain [DrunkAwakening]

dataList.name: Night Drifter of the Drunken Palm
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: reset this unit's SP to 10
Take -50% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] (rounded down)

Take -30% damage from Sinners

If this unit gained 2 or more [SipOfAlcoholJin] last turn, heal 5 SP for every 10% missing HP at Turn Start (max 40)

When entering a new phase, if this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: River of Blooddrops (血滴成河)
dataList.desc:
Activates if at least 1 enemy has 10+ [Laceration] at Turn End
Against enemies with [Laceration], inflict 1 [DrunkBlood] for every 5 [Laceration] they have (3 times per enemy)

dataList.name: Sparring Complete
dataList.desc: Ends Encounter when this unit's HP drops below 20%

dataList.name: Reversed Circuitry
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: at less than 10 [Charge] Count, consume 5% HP on self to gain +5 [Charge] Count
Turn End: at 15+ [Charge] Count, consume 5 [Charge] Count to heal 5% HP on self

dataList.name: Slightly Relieved Burdens
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: heal 5 SP
Turn Start: at 20+ SP, gain 1 [Enhancement]

dataList.name: Burden of Responsibility
dataList.desc: If this unit's HP drops below 50% or less in this Encounter, starting from the next turn, gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] every turn

dataList.name: Rule by Fear
dataList.desc: If the target has less than 0 SP: deal even more damage the further the target's SP is from 0 (+3% damage per 1 SP)

dataList.name: It's going to be so much fun, hmm?
dataList.desc: Gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp] every time any target gains a negative effect

dataList.name: Twisted Determination
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win, heal 5 SP
On Clash Lose, gain 1 [Enhancement]
